name: Idle Car Tycoon
description:
Are you prepared to run the best carwash ever?

Are you prepared to run the best gas station ever?

Rule your carwash and gas station, become the richest manager!

Start with a small one, and work on it to make it grow.

Improve your carwash and control every aspect of the business. Build surrounding facilities to bring more cars to your town, and offer them the most enjoyable experience. Extend carwash to increase the number of cars.

Build the best gas station empire! Run the most famous gas station in the world! Will you invest your money in improving the facilities of your gas station? Or will you increase the price to earn more money? Take important decisions to create the best gas station.

If you like management and idle games, you’ll enjoy Idle Car Tycoon. An easy-to-play game, but challenging. Start with a small carwash or gas station and take important business decisions in order to grow your tycoon. Transform your small business into the best in the world!


Features:
- Easy-to-play game for every player
- Different challenges to complete
- Amazing animations and great 3D graphics
- Several sites available.
- Take important business decisions.
